name: You Donkey!
description:
Donkey does what donkey does. Help the merchant to overcome all obstacles and collaborate with his donkey to leave the forest. The donkey will look for food when is hungry, will rest when is tired and will run away when a bee scare him!

Controls:

  • Use W-A-S-D or arrow key to move.
  • Press E to pick up an Apple.
  • Press Q to drop it.
  • Press R to restart the level.

Goal:

Reach the goal point with your beloved donkey in all three levels to win the game!
